mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product ( type, name, quantity, unit, price, reg_id, reg_date, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{regId}, NOW(), 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_product SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx} AND is_deleted = 'N'
UPDATE t_product SET is_deleted = 'Y', mod_date = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
